text: Hey, watch where you're going man. Sorry, didn't see you there. Whatever, just back off. I'm not looking for trouble. Well you found it anyway. Hey guys, calm down. This isn't worth fighting over. Mind your own business. I said back off! Security! We need some help over here! This guy's threatening me. I'm not threatening anyone, he bumped into me and started this. You want to take this outside? I've got something in my car that'll make you regret this. Whoa, are you talking about a weapon? Everyone needs to calm down right now. I'm calling the bouncer.
